body:
I don't know, been messing around in after effects and this came out!
Hope you enjoy. (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DY6Es86GGRk&feature=youtu.be)
 
Software used:

Adobe After effects CC 2014
  Pan-Crop
  Trapcode ; Twitch
  Sapphire ; Shake
  Trapcode ; Shine
  Magic Bullet Looks ; Saturation, Color adjust, Gradient, Soft Edges,

Sony Vegas Pro 13
  Pan-Crop
  Blackbars
 
Song: Pmac - One

replies.body: Dude you should definitely do Avicus Nebula Highlights, kinda like xNestorio's UHC Highlights, except u can do it like every week or so, like 1 or 2 Nebula Highlights a vid and u can edit them w/ a different songs and title them based on either the song, the theme/feeling/map, or a moment in the recording like a Half a Heart Clutch escape or Ace of Monument's (mine all mon's) or like maybe an OP enchant of a sword like this https://youtu.be/QmX-q-JemRU
